title: Data mining of a public database
snippet:
I am looking for someone that can datamine this website https://roa.sdcourt.ca.gov/roa/

You will be using the "Date Search" option and select the category "Civil". You will need to find documents from 2008 - 2016 that will have these words in them "Relieved" or "Withdraw".

Attached is an example of what the searched for document listing will look like. 

We just need the case number, the date it was filed, representation, name of document.

We need these all to be in a spreadsheet with all fields separate. the Representation field should be split up as well.

This is just a test project and if the person selected does well, we will have many more jobs for you to do.

Please message me if you have any questions regarding the project.
